thread.section_title: Flashbay Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Flashbay | www.flashbay.com
thread.title: Deidre Williams

author: Deidre Williams
title: Deidre Williams
text: The service has been quick from the initial contact requesting a Quote: . We also received a lovely sample package that arrived in one day. The proof was perfect and customer service from Alessandra Concepcion was superb and extremely helpful. The custom Flash Drives arrived quickly and were exactly what we wanted. We are so excited to share our images with clients on our new Flash Drives.
